title: Google\Cloud\Dlp\V2\InspectConfig\FindingLimits
name: FindingLimits
description:
Configuration to control the number of findings returned.

Generated from protobuf message google.privacy.dlp.v2.InspectConfig.FindingLimits

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.max_findings_per_item
params.description: Max number of findings that will be returned for each item scanned. When set within InspectJobConfig, the maximum returned is 2000 regardless if this is set higher. When set within InspectContentRequest, this field is ignored.

params.name: data.max_findings_per_request
params.description: Max number of findings that will be returned per request/job. When set within InspectContentRequest, the maximum returned is 2000 regardless if this is set higher.

params.name: data.max_findings_per_info_type
params.description: Configuration of findings limit given for specified infoTypes.

methods.name: getMaxFindingsPerItem
methods.description:
Max number of findings that will be returned for each item scanned.

When set within InspectJobConfig, the maximum returned is 2000 regardless if this is set higher. When set within InspectContentRequest, this field is ignored.

Generated from protobuf field int32 max_findings_per_item = 1;
